title: Part 229 - Insurer Practices During The Covid-19 Pandemic
content:
Part 229 - Insurer Practices During The Covid-19 Pandemic

State Regulations
§ 229.1 - Preamble
§ 229.2 - Definitions
§ 229.3 - Extension of grace periods for group life insurance policies and certificates
§ 229.4 - Prohibited practices
§ 229.5 - Premium repayment, demonstration of financial hardship, and voluntary cancellation
§ 229.6 - Premium finance agency cancellation; return of unearned premium

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
